Other Information.Test Conditions: 40% RH, 298 K, 500 ppm ammonia in nitrogen with 20% oxygen
Other Information.Additional Info: Breakthrough time at 12.5 ppm ammonia: 189 min g⁻¹ for CPO-27(Ni)_1

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Ammonia adsorption capacity: 64 mg g⁻¹ for CPO-27(Ni)_1

Other Information.Additional Info: Repeated compaction during dry granulation has little impact on the structure of CPO-27(Ni), but causes a decrease in surface area.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 40% RH, 298 K, 500 ppm ammonia in nitrogen with 20% oxygen
Other Information.Additional Info: Breakthrough time at 12.5 ppm ammonia: 135 min g⁻¹ for MIL-100(Fe)_1

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Ammonia adsorption capacity: 47 mg g⁻¹ for MIL-100(Fe)_1

Other Information.Additional Info: Repeated compaction during dry granulation results in a decrease in surface area and breakthrough time.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 40% RH, 298 K, 500 ppm ammonia in nitrogen with 20% oxygen
Other Information.Additional Info: Breakthrough time at 12.5 ppm ammonia: 210 min g⁻¹ for Cu-BTC_1

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Ammonia adsorption capacity: 105 mg g⁻¹ for Cu-BTC_1

Other Information.Additional Info: Repeated compaction during dry granulation leads to decomposition of Cu-BTC, resulting in significant loss of ammonia adsorption capacity.
